name: Minor Illusion
img: is static unless you use action to move it. Physical interaction reveals illusory effect.

description.value: Primary Energy: Space 3 (small sensory illusion + close range) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 5 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Create a sound or image at close range no larger than a 5ft cube. Sound can be any noise. Image is static unless you use action to move it. Physical interaction reveals illusory effect. Saving Throw: Perception vs Space Mastery Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = 1 hour, 5 = 4 hours
